page.title: 04 the gamekeeper
page.content: {has kept to its old barns.Both farms {store their wheat,barley,hay,and sugar {beet in these barns until needed. { In connection with farming we also {interviewed the Gamekeeper to the {Fitzwilliam Estates situated in and {around our block.It is a full time job {and he has to breed all the birds as {wild ones get killed by the chemicals {used on the land.Another nuisance to {the pheasants are passing {aeroplanes.Although these do not {bother most of the residents of Upton {naturally they can frighten the birds {until they are used to the noise.The {shoots take place 8 times per year in {the months of December and January. { The birds are not troubled by {outsiders to the village.The {increasing number of ramblers always {stick to the marked footpaths and,in {most respects observe the Country Code
